snippet: A look back at the Numberplay puzzles of 2011.
abstract: A look back at the Numberplay puzzles of 2011.
lead_paragraph: Happy New Year to all Numberplay readers. The New Year is traditionally a time to look back nostalgically at the past year, and look forward with hope toward the coming year. Today, I want to do mostly the former, because puzzles are infinite and open-ended and not even the authors of Numberplay know what the future will bring! But looking back over 2011 there are plenty of treasures that we can revisit, savor and perhaps extend.
